in this tweet, i'm using a critical tone to express my concerns about data privacy. by using the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphÃ¤reisttot (privacy is dead), i'm emphasizing that i believe privacy is no longer a reality in today's digital age. the comment "ich dachte, die regierung und facebook kriegen ohnehin alles, was sie wollen" (i thought the government and facebook got everything they wanted anyway) suggests that i feel like our personal information is not safe from government or corporate exploitation. the last part of the tweet, "#bigbrotheriswatchingyou," references george orwell's novel "1984" and implies that we are being constantly monitored, further emphasizing my skepticism towards data privacy.
